thing-type.label: RF9640 Z-Wave Plus universal smart dimmer
thing-type.description: Z-Wave Plus universal smart dimmer<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<strong&gtOPERATION INSTRUCTIONS</strong&gt</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtPress once to turn lights ON at previously selected level.</li&gt <li&gtPress again to turn lights OFF.</li&gt <li&gtWhen lights are OFF, press and hold for 2 seconds for full brightness.</li&gt <li&gtWhen lights are ON, press and hold for 2 seconds until the blue LED blinks. After the preset delay, the lights will begin fading to OFF (up to 4 minutes).</li&gt <li&gtAmber ON/OFF LED indicates that dimmer is turned on</li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtThis product may be added to a new or existing Z-Wave network. A Cooper Wiring Devices Z-Wave device has a blue LED, which will blink when the device is not included in a Z-Wave network. The LED stops blinking when the device is in a network.</li&gt <li&gtTo include this device in a Z-Wave network, select the command on your Z Wave controller for inclusion (Install, Add Device, Add Node, Include Device, etc.). Then press the device switch one time to include it in the network. The LED will stop blinking.</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTo exclude this device from a Z-Wave network, select the command on your Z-Wave controller for exclusion (Uninstall, Remove Device, Remove Node, Exclude Device, etc.). Then press the device switch one time to exclude it from the network. The LED will start blinking.</p&gt
